Welcome to Loki!

Loki is a proof-of-concept application that I'm working on for testing out ideas with Node addons and Angular2.

In order to make Loki work, you'll need to:

  • Build the Loki addons from LokiModules/LokiModules.sln
  • Possibly update module_file_path in config.js
  • Install (with npm install) packages both in the root and in the dist folder.
